message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000, which reflects its true worth.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your position, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer. I could consider letting it go for $17,000.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, based on my budget constraints, I am unable to go above $14,000 for this product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
